keyMappings: # Insert your preferred key mappings here.
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
#####################################
### 工具搜索
zh: https://www.zhihu.com/search?type=content&q=%s 知乎
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s Github
ghs: https://github.com/Ewen-ZY?direction=desc&sort=created&tab=stars&utf8=✓&q=%s Github Stars
ghre: https://github.com/Ewen-ZY?utf8=✓&tab=repositories&q=%s Github repositories
cl: https://unbug.github.io/codelf/#%s CODELF
aur: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/?O=0&K=%s AUR Package
awk: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/%s Archlinux Wiki

### 音乐搜索
wyy: https://music.163.com/#/search/m/?s=%s 网易云音乐

### 视频搜索
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
yk: https://so.youku.com/search_video/q_%s 优酷
bl: https://search.bilibili.com/all?keyword=%s 哔哩哔哩
dbm: https://movie.douban.com/subject_search?search_text=%s 豆瓣电影

### 搜索引擎
gg: https://www.google.ie/search?q=%s Google
bd: http://www.baidu.com/s?wd=%s 百度

### Google翻译
gtac: https://translate.google.com/#view=home&op=translate&sl=auto&tl=zh-CN&text=%s Google 译中
gtec: https://translate.google.com/#view=home&op=translate&sl=en&tl=zh-CN&text=%s Google 英译中
gtce: https://translate.google.com/#view=home&op=translate&sl=zh-CN&tl=en&text=%s Google 中译英
